Class GenericMVCModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GenericMVCModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericCardGameModel, GenericCardGamePlayer

    public abstract class GenericMVCModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    contains: public methods: protected methods: protected GenericMVCModel() synchronized addModelSubscriber(GenericMVCModelSubscriber)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addModelSubscriber(GenericMVCModelSubscriber subscriber)
      adds a subscriber to the model, if more than one person is trying to be added at the same time it creates a queue
      void notifyModelSubscribers()
      notifies all subscribers of a change to the model calls the modelChanged() function in all the modelSubscribers
      void removeModelSubscriber(GenericMVCModelSubscriber subscriber)
      removes a subscriber from the model, if more than one person is trying to leave at the same time it creates a queue

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • removeModelSubscriber

        removes a subscriber from the model, if more than one person is trying to leave at the same time it creates a queue
        Parameters:
        subscriber - the subscriber to remove

        notifies all subscribers of a change to the model calls the modelChanged() function in all the modelSubscribers
